channel.title: 2006 revolution Development team aplication
channel.description:
Alright guy's I'm getting back to my old creativescape source and I'd like to remodel tutorial Island. Only problem is that I'm going to need alittle help as I have no Idea how to fix the yellow arrow. Also a little HTML, php, and mysql action :D
[size=12pt]Alright so lets get this done quickly. This is a shard based server that has been 98% coded by r0cky 0wnz and 2% by me so far.[/size]
Here is the application sample:
[size=12pt] Name(if you have one): Age: Experience with Html,JAva, ...etc: Msn?: Ever worked with shard?: Do you like cookies?:
[/size]
If you would like to join add me on MSN:
Heatrn22@hotmail.com (GAwd damn if you post your skype!)

item.title: 2006 revolution Development team aplication
item.dc:creator: @chillwitm888 chillwitm888
item.description:
@chillwitm888 wrote:

creativescape is a 459, If i had seen your other release, it’s also a 459. which is probably in the late 2007’s
if you are looking forward to a 2006 remake use runesource or if you want already partial completed source files
you can use xepicz or xepicx i forgot the name
by i roll deep i.
Goodluck anyhow, btw you should know how to fix the arrows
